product_name: Fenix Fenix UC45 USB Rechargeable Flashlight
long_description: Throwing a beam over 800 ft. in turbo mode, the powerful Fenix UC45 flashlight switches easily between 4 brightness levels and charges via USB cable, offering custom illumination for any setting.
short_description: Throwing a beam over 800 ft. in turbo mode, the powerful Fenix UC45 flashlight switches easily between 4 brightness levels and charges via USB cable, offering custom illumination for any setting.
